content:
75
MANNER OF DIVIDING PROPERTY
(1) After establishing the shares of co-owned property, spouses may agree on the manner of dividing the property. Their agreement to become co-owners of items in proportion to their shares of co-owned property shall also be considered division of property.
(2) If there is no agreement on division of property, a court shall divide the property in accordance with the rules applying to the division of co-owned property.
 
FAMILY
